critique: The document aims to foster a sense of fairness and resolution in labor disputes within the steel industry. The primary emotions the President wants to elicit are joy (through fair resolution and improved working conditions), and reduced fear and anger (by addressing potential conflicts and ensuring employee rights). There might be a degree of surprise at the swift action and establishment of the board. Sadness and disgust are less relevant in the intended outcome, but there might be some sadness if previous attempts to resolve issues have failed.
